headline: Is It Too Late To Consider GM After Its 47% 2025 Surge?
summary: If you are wondering whether General Motors is still a value play after its huge run, or if you have already missed the boat, you are in the right place. GM stock has climbed 3.8% over the last week, 7.0% over the last month, and is now up 47.4% year to date, with a 45.1% gain over the last year and more than doubling investors' money over 3 years. That surge has come as investors refocus on GM's push into electric and autonomous vehicles, along with ongoing cost discipline and capital...

headline: Morgan Stanley Upgrades General Motors (GM) Stock to Overweight
summary: General Motors Company (NYSE:GM) is one of the Most Undervalued Stocks to Buy Right Now. On December 8, Morgan Stanley upgraded the company’s stock to “Overweight” from “Equal Weight,” with a price objective of $90, up from the prior target of $54, as reported by The Fly. The firm cited execution gains, improvement in capital discipline as well […]

headline: Ford, GM Race Ahead of the Market
summary: Ford and GM stocks are outperforming the S&P 500 this year. They were supposed to be losers as the companies lagged Tesla in EV market share.

raw.headline: Ford, GM Race Ahead of the Market

headline: She's Holding Onto $650K In Tesla Stock, Waiting For It To Hit $1M. Dave Ramsey Says, 'I'm Not Dissing Tesla, But I'm Not Buying It'
summary: A woman who worked at Tesla for six years is sitting on $650,000 worth of company stock, and she’s hoping it grows to $1 million before she sells. The 37-year-old project engineer earns $70,000 a year, rents for $1,000 a month, and has $20,000 in debt she plans to pay off this year. Despite having no cash savings, she’s holding onto the stock, nervous about tax implications and convinced it could rise further. Gambling, Not Strategy Personal finance experts Dave Ramsey and George Kamel discussed

headline: General Motors Company (GM) a Moderate Buy, Per Analysts Consensus
summary: General Motors Company (NYSE:GM) is among the Top 15 Lowest P/E Ratios of the S&P 500 in 2025. On November 24, Evercore ISI lifted its price target on the stock to $74 from $68, while maintaining an Outperform rating. After a challenging 2025, the firm projects a 20% upside for the automotive industry in 2026 […]

headline: Bull of the Day: General Motors (GM)
summary: Soaring +40% year to date, the days of GM's "boring" stock performance are in the past, as several catalysts are working in the automaker's favor right now.
